location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 100 to William Hornby, President and Governor Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports arrival of the MercuryPacket with Mr Sullivan, Major Johnson and Mr Mcauly on board. Describes in detail attempts to apprehend a suspected French messenger (en route to India) and reports latest news of French activities in the area. An additional note records the receipt of a packet from Bombay and other administrative matters. Also reports news from Lieutenant Charles Pickett that four French privateers were cruising in the Gulf.
